abstract: Reports include retail sales for April, the Consumer Price Index for April and quarterly reports from Cisco Systems, Wal-Mart Stores and J.C. Penney.
snippet: Reports include retail sales for April, the Consumer Price Index for April and quarterly reports from Cisco Systems, Wal-Mart Stores and J.C. Penney.
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC REPORTS Information to be released includes retail sales for April, business inventories for March, and China industrial production and retail sales for April (Monday); the import price index and euro area industrial production (Tuesday); the Producer Price Index and industrial production for April; capital flows for March, and the euro area gross domestic product for the first quarter (Wednesday); the Consumer Price Index for April, initial jobless claims, and housing starts for April (Thursday); the University of Michigan’s preliminary consumer sentiment index for May, and leading indicators for April (Friday).

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
headline.print_headline: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
